text: August R. Lindt (5 August 1905 - 14 April 2000), also known as Auguste R. Lindt, was a Swiss lawyer and diplomat. He was Chairman of UNICEF from 1953 to 1954 and as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from 1956 to 1960. He was an adviser to the President of Rwanda from 1973 to 1975. ==References== ==Other websites== *Rolf Wilhelm (ed.): August R. Lindt: Patriot und Weltb√ºrger. Haupt Verlag, Bern 2003, . title: Auguste R. Lindt
